title: A Plea for Arms
goal: Solidify the alliance, particularly Kael's commitment, and prepare for direct action against Valerius, despite the overwhelming odds.
stakes_shift: The group commits to a dangerous, possibly suicidal, course of action against a powerful, entrenched lord, risking their lives and the stability of the region.

bridge.from_prev: The group has identified Valerius as their enemy and understands his treachery.
bridge.to_next: Valerius's agents make their presence known, actively hunting the group and increasing the immediate danger.

sections.title: The Hard Choice
sections.intent: Kael grapples with fully committing to the cause, weighing personal risk against moral obligation.

scenes.summary: Kael, facing the reality of confronting a powerful lord, struggles with the choice between self-preservation and fighting for a greater cause.
scenes.outcome: Kael fully commits to the group's cause, accepting the immense personal risk.

sections.title: United Front
sections.intent: The entire group solidifies their resolve and begins to plan their next move.

scenes.summary: With Kael's commitment, the group forms a united front, discussing strategies to expose Valerius and counter his influence.
scenes.outcome: The core group solidifies their alliance and begins to strategize against Valerius.

sections.title: The Plan Unfolds
sections.intent: Outline the initial, dangerous steps of their plan to expose or confront Valerius.

scenes.summary: Their plan involves gathering public support and finding a way to present the evidence against Valerius in a manner he cannot easily dismiss.
scenes.outcome: The group devises a perilous plan to expose Valerius and rally support against him.
